name: cafe
description: This is my first website built using bootstrap

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin homePage.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/homePage.html && usemin ourStory.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/ourStory.html && usemin menu.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/menu.html && usemin venue.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/venue.html && usemin contactUs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactUs.html

author: Westley Cervantes
